thread.title: Scott Disick 'proposed' to Kourtney Kardashian on family trip to Costa Rica and reality star said NO
thread.title_full: Scott Disick 'proposed' to Kourtney Kardashian on family trip to Costa Rica and reality star said NO

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Scott Disick 'proposed' to Kourtney Kardashian on family trip to Costa Rica and reality star said NO
text:
Scott Disick 'proposed' to Kourtney Kardashian on family trip to Costa Rica and reality star said NO Scott ended up ditching his ex and kids a day early to fly to Miami Share Scott proposed to Kourtney in Costa Rica   Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
The reasons behind Scott Disick's swift departure from the family trip Costa Rica are starting to become a lot clearer. 
According to US reports, the 33-year-old star told Kourtney Kardashian he wanted to get married but she had no interest in reconciling. 
The pair split back in 2015 and he's reportedly been trying to better him ever since in a bid to win back his baby mother. 
“Scott proposed to Kourtney,” a Kardashian source told Us Weekly . “Not with a ring. He just said, ‘Let’s get married.’” 
But Kourtney is intent on keeping their relationship platonic and "told him no". (Photo: FameFlynet) Scott Disick and Kourtney Kardashian (Photo: Instagram/KourtneyKardashian) 
“Scott was embarrassed, upset and angry," the source continued. 
Scott then ditched Kourtney and the kids a day before the holiday was due to end and flew to Miami. 
There, he was pictured in the arms of two separate women, including stunning model Jessica Harris. (Photo: Instagram/KylieJenner) (Photo: Snapchat/KourtneyKardashian) 
It comes as it was claimed the Costa Rica was holiday was all a big sham. 
Rather than taking it as an opportunity to relax, in the five days Kim and her sisters were there, Kanye's wife did four set-up photo shoots for a new edition of her Selfish book. 
She was also worked 12-hour days filming series 13 of Keeping Up With The Kardashians. 
“The holiday was a sham staged just for the show – no one had so much as an hour off without the cameras in their face or a photographer taking pictures,” a source told Heat . (Photo: Instagram/kourtneykardash) 
“Kris [Jenner] is making up for lost time. Production on the show shut down for a while after Kim got robbed in Paris, so she’s really pushing to get some good footage now.” 
The source continued: “Wake-up call was 6am. The family brought two personal trainers with them, so there was an hour of working out, then two hours of bikini shoots or filming in bikinis, before a liquid breakfast to avoid bloating.” Like us on Facebook
